attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to justify the golden handshakes paid out of public funds for underperformance and illegal activities
sacked or resigned should mean they have been removed from office for underperformance and should forfeit handout's
resigned means they have shirked their responsibility and walked way from that position therefore should also not recieve payout especially when they resigned because their fraudulent past has caught up with them since when does a person get a golden handshake for wrong doing
